headline: Meta’s Subscription Push Across Three Apps Reveals Fear of AI-Driven Ad Revenue Disruption
summary: Meta’s simultaneous subscription testing across Instagram, Facebook, and WhatsApp isn’t about innovation. It’s about insurance. The world’s most profitable advertising machine doesn’t diversify revenue streams when the core business is thriving. Meta Platforms (NASDAQ:META) generated a 40.1% operating margin in Q3 2025, with revenue of $51.24 billion growing 26.2% year-over-year. Trailing twelve-month earnings per share ... headline: Corning (NYSE:GLW) Reports Sales Below Analyst Estimates In Q4 CY2025 Earnings
summary: Glass and electronic component manufacturer Corning (NYSE:GLW) fell short of the markets revenue expectations in Q4 CY2025, but sales rose 8.8% year on year to $4.22 billion. Next quarter’s revenue guidance of $4.25 billion underwhelmed, coming in 0.5% below analysts’ estimates. Its non-GAAP profit of $0.72 per share was 2.1% above analysts’ consensus estimates.

raw.headline: Corning (NYSE:GLW) Reports Sales Below Analyst Estimates In Q4 CY2025 Earnings
raw.summary: Glass and electronic component manufacturer Corning (NYSE:GLW) fell short of the markets revenue expectations in Q4 CY2025, but sales rose 8.8% year on year to $4.22 billion. Next quarter’s revenue guidance of $4.25 billion underwhelmed, coming in 0.5% below analysts’ estimates. Its non-GAAP profit of $0.72 per share was 2.1% above analysts’ consensus estimates.

headline: Corning forecasts first-quarter sales above estimates on strong optical fiber demand
summary: Corning on Wednesday forecast first-quarter sales above estimates, boosted by resilient ​demand for its fiber‑optic products, which generate ‌nearly 40% of the company's revenue.  The Gorilla Glass maker, ‌a key supplier to Apple, has stepped up investment in its optical communications business as major technology companies race to expand data‑center infrastructure to ⁠support rising AI ‌workloads.  On Tuesday, Corning inked an up to $6 billion multi‑year deal with Meta ‍Platforms to supply fiber‑optic cables for the social media giant's AI‑focused data centers.

headline: Corning Stock Falls After Earnings. It Can’t Extend the Meta Momentum.
summary: Shares of  Corning  fell Wednesday even after the glass maker posted better-than-expected quarterly adjusted earnings and sales.  The stock’s double-digit surge the day before may have set investor expectations too high.  The company posted adjusted earnings of 72 cents a share for the fourth quarter, surpassing analysts’ estimates of 71 cents, according to FactSet.

headline: Corning: Q4 Earnings Snapshot
summary: The average estimate of six analysts surveyed by Zacks Investment Research was for earnings of 70 cents per share. The specialty glass maker posted revenue of $4.22 billion in the period. Its adjusted revenue was $4.41 billion, also surpassing Street forecasts.

raw.headline: Corning: Q4 Earnings Snapshot
raw.summary: The average estimate of six analysts surveyed by Zacks Investment Research was for earnings of 70 cents per share. The specialty glass maker posted revenue of $4.22 billion in the period. Its adjusted revenue was $4.41 billion, also surpassing Street forecasts.

headline: US Stock Market Today: S&P 500 Futures Edge Higher As Fed Rate Decision Looms
summary: The Morning Bull - US Market Morning Update Wednesday, Jan, 28 2026 US stock futures are pointing slightly higher this morning, with E mini S&P 500 contracts up about 0.3%, as investors look ahead to a Federal Reserve meeting that is widely expected to leave interest rates in a 3.5% to 3.75% range. The key issue is the timing of the next rate cut, which markets are watching closely because it feeds directly into mortgage rates, credit card costs and P/E multiples. At the same time, private...

headline: Corning (GLW) Is Up 18.5% After Securing Up To $6 Billion Meta AI Fiber Deal
summary: Corning Incorporated and Meta Platforms recently announced a multiyear agreement worth up to US$6 billion for Corning to supply advanced optical fiber, cable, and connectivity solutions to support Meta’s US data center expansion, alongside a manufacturing capacity build-out in North Carolina. Beyond its size, the deal positions Corning as an anchor supplier for next-generation AI data centers, tying its core optical technologies directly to Meta’s long-term infrastructure roadmap.
